txt.en: 'Few only in Middle-earth possess the power to destroy Gwathnor for good. I believe Mithrandir could have, had he not fallen in battle with its master. Few others, and none in Moria, though Gwathnor itself is a lesser spirit and of low rank among its kind. If Goroth√∫l devised some means of showing Gwathnor the way back to these halls, I fear it might be very possible for it to return when its strength does.'
